channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lights on staircase never working!, 22nd September
item.description:
Please fix these lights before someone gets seriously hurt.

item.title: Stair lights never working, 22nd September
item.description:
It’s getting dark early & these steps are never lit. It’s so dangerous. Why were lights put there when they never work. A street lamp should be put there before someone hurts themselves
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lady Dock Path, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Control Parking Zone Sign spray painted Hotspot, 22nd September
item.description:
Control Parking Zone sign painted over with black spray paint. This Hotspot cannot stay clean for more than 2-3 weekdays. There’s no parking spaces available for local residents or visitors to the nearby amenities and businesses close by.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fielding Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollards and roadsigns at the pedestrian crossing graffitied with the red cross, 22nd September
item.description:
The area now feels unsafe, even to just cross the road, as graffiti which is widely known to be racist and xenophobic has been sprayed on all crossings on this road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 127, Croydon Road, Beckenham, London

item.title: Light out above "stop" sign., 22nd September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bondway, Vauxhall, London

item.title: Sofa dumped on corner of Bellenden Road and Oxenford Street, 22nd September
item.description:
Sofa has been dumped on corner of Bellenden Road and Oxenford Street. Causes an obstruction to pedestrians, wheelchair users, pushchairs. Last week, large empty flat-pack boxes (some sofa sized, unsurprisingly) were dumped in same location. Address on boxes was reported privately.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellenden Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: College Crescent at Swiss Cottage, 22nd September
item.description:
Road closure not listed on Camden roadworks website. Camden claimed it ended on 19/09/2025. Major road closure until 26/10/2025. This closure is causing significant noise, congestion and pollution on adjacent roads especially Winchester Road. Please use diversion signs to encourage southbound traffic to route along Eton Avenue, instead of backing up along Winchester Road for eighteen hours a day.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Crescent, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed van dumped over 2 parking slots, 22nd September
item.description:
This van was dumped here over 3 weeks ago, and is taking up 2 parking spaces. it has no tax

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnfield Gardens, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge amount of rubbish uncollected, 100 Belgrave Road, left all day and night, 22nd September
item.description:
Some of it has been dumped here since Sunday! I think the binmen keep missing the spot because of parked cars blocking it. It is a daily issue outside 100 Belgrave Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Belgrave Road, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household waste & building aggregate dumped on both sides of the Rd., 22nd September
item.description:
For months, the site has been used as a dump, creating a public health hazard, degrading our environment. This illegal activity undermines community safety, violating existing waste mgmt regs. What r the council going to do to prevent this from reoccurring

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Around 50-100yards from Junction 3. Flymo leaf blower, 22nd September
item.description:
Driving in the middle lane down the M25 going towards Erith, a car swerved quickly unable to see why until I was closer. I saw the leaf blower. I couldn’t swerve due to having drivers next to me and I couldn’t brake due to having someone behind so I collided with this and dragged it around 50-100 yards up the motorway after junction 3 until pulling over on hard shoulder and removing it away from under the car. Put it over the barrier and took images. But damage was done to my car. Not sure with how the obstruction was there for or when it was dropped.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M25, Sutton-at-Hone and Hawley, Dartford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35a, Silvester Road, East Dulwich, London

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gipsy Road, West Heath, London

item.title: This tree is too large, 22nd September
item.description:
I have previously complained about the size of this tree a couple of years ago and didn’t receive any response. It is way too big to have stuck outside mine and my neighbours house, it’s is blocking the light. Please can it be trimmed back. I look forward to receiving a response. Brenda

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Genesta Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
